return/recoil, change/convert from one state/condition to another,   wash/whiten, make round, surround, compete/contend for glory/superiority, the   white around the eye, intense whiteness of the white of the eye and intense   blackness of the black (with fairness around)* not found in humans but   attributed to them by way of comparison. *likened to the eyes   of gazelles/cows/bulls.  One who whitens clothes/garments by washing them, hence applied to the   disciples/apostles/companions of Jesus (see "hawariyyun"   in 3:52, 5:111, 5:112, 61:14) because their trade was apparently to do this.   Or it is applied to one bearing the following significations: one who is freed   and cleared of every vice, fault or defect, one who has been tried and proved   time after time and found to be free of vices, faults or defects. A thing   pure. One who advises/counsels or acts sincerely/honestly/faithfully,   friend/assistant, fair woman/man.hara vb. (1)  impf. act. 84:14hawariy n.m.
